<!-- Since we know the health box is fine, print out everything by using the table (I made the little icons, they're free to good homes, etc.). --> [FOR(i,0,len,+1, ""),CODE:{ [h:box = substring(Health, i, i+1)] [h,if(box=="e"):temp=4] [h,if(box=="a"):temp=3] [h,if(box=="l"):temp=2] [h,if(box=="b"):temp=1] <image src='[r: tableImage("HealthBoxes", temp)]'></image> }]

[h:fullHealth = Health] [h:tempNum = TempHealth] [h:fullHealthLen = length(Health)] [h: abort(tempNum)] [h: abort(fullHealthLen)] [h:realHealth = substring(fullHealth, 0, fullHealthLen-tempNum)] [h:realTemp = substring(fullHealth, fullHealthLen-tempNum, fullHealthLen)]
[h:abortTest = 1] [h: aInd = lastIndexOf(realHealth, "a")] [h, if(aInd == length(realHealth)-1): abortTest = 0] [h: abort(abortTest)]
[h:realTempE = realTemp] [h:realTempLen = length(realTemp)] [h:tempE = indexOf(realTemp, "e")] [h, if(tempE != -1), code: { [h:realTempE=substring(realTemp, 0, tempE)] }]
[h:realELen = length(realTempE)] [h:textT = "Didn't go into for loop"]
[h:"Because of the way the if and the for loops work, you need to have a positive number for the for loop, even if you don't want to execute it. Likewise, you can check with the if statement, but you still need to have a correct for loop. So we use a fake number (tempRealLen) below to make sure that we don't throw an error statement if the temporary boxes, removed of empties, is less than 1."]
[h:tempRealLen = realELen] [h, if(realELen < 2): tempRealLen = 1]
[h,if(realELen>0), for(i, 0, tempRealLen-1, +1), code: { [h:testB = indexOf(realHealth, "b")] [h:testL = -1] [h, if(testB != -1), CODE:{ [h:text1 = substring(realHealth,0, testB)] [h:text2 = substring(realHealth,testB+1)] [h:replaceH = text1 + "l" + text2] [h:realHealth = replaceH] }] [h, if(testB==-1): testL = indexOf(realHealth, "l")] [h, if(testL!=-1), CODE:{ [h:text1 = substring(realHealth,0, testL)] [h:text2 = substring(realHealth,testL+1)] [h:replaceH = text1 + "a" + text2] [h:realHealth = replaceH] }] }]
[h:setProperty("MaxHealth", "[R:5+Stamina]")] [h:setProperty("TempHealth", 0)] [h:setProperty("Health", realHealth)]
[MACRO("checkWound@Lib:WoD"): 0] [MACRO("getHealth@Lib:WoD"): 0]
